description:
With the death of the third general of Asura, Han, the second general of Asura Hyoh departs in person, at the head of his army, to suppress Kenshiro. Learning of the situation, the master of the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, Jukei, shockingly claims that Kenshiro cannot win against Hyoh. Kenshiro is Hyoh`s younger brother by blood, and furthermore, Hyoh has a hidden secret...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mort de Rock ! Kenshiro, ils sont morts pour toi !!
Rock`s Message of Death! Kenshiro, Hang On to Your Friend`s Life!!
ロック死の伝達! ケンシロウ友の命を受けとめよ!!
